name: Shopping Panic!
description:
Welcome to Shopping Panic! 
As a cashier, your job is to scan every item and put them in the bag.
Will you be able to keep up with the conveyor? Your pay depends on it.

Graphics : Zahra Abada, Ylann Dauvé, Emma Romeuf, Alexandre Bellanger

Code : Johanne Huet, Berenice Girault
